## IEasyCallControlBase.unmute() method

Unmutes the device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unmute(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

If a call is not active.

## Remarks

You can only change the mute state while the device is in an active call.
